title: (x) Them Jeans flyer serif face w/ swashes - Cabernet {Marcelo}
content:
Anybody familiar with this serif-based font? thanks in advance,  
Danny

comments.content: I think it’s [Cabernet](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011015937/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0001003#specimen), by Jason Walcott.
